summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by updating the centralized phone number and tel URL computation in frontend/src/config/contact.ts. However, there is no diff evidence that other tel: links were audited/updated to use contactConfig.phoneUrl (REQ-2), nor that the post-deploy smoke-check documentation was updated (REQ-3).

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure every phone/call CTA in the UI uses the centralized contactConfig.phoneUrl (no hard-coded phone numbers) so future phone updates work consistently.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows changes to frontend/src/config/contact.ts plus metadata/state files. There are no shown modifications to any UI components (e.g., StickyContactButtons.tsx or other CTAs) to remove hard-coded tel: links or the old number, and no evidence of a codebase-wide cleanup/search result.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add/refresh a post-deploy smoke-check item to verify the Call Now/Call Us button dials the configured number (+918824495515) on mobile.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence shows changes to frontend/scripts/post-deploy-smoke-check.md, and that file is not listed among modified files.
evidence: <file-diff>: modified files list does not include frontend/scripts/post-deploy-smoke-check.md

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project metadata/state tracking entries for AR-1/AR-2/AR-3 in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request changes to project_state.json; it only specifies frontend config/UI usage and a smoke-check doc update.
The BuildRequest does not request updating summary/index files; requested changes target contact config, UI tel link usage, and a smoke-check markdown file.
